message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for you. Given its significance to you, I understand its worth stands at $1,000,000. Considering the exceptional quality and the exclusive nature of this product, I propose to offer it to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer reflects my intention to ensure you have the chance to own something truly remarkable while also maximizing the value I receive for such a valuable item. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
